ScriptGroup.name: Communications

Script.name: Communications Display Echo
Script.script:
function communications:echo(what, debug, err) --colored tags for message echo local main_tag = "<dark_khaki>(<sienna>communications<dark_khaki>): <white>" local debug_tag = "<deep_sky_blue>(<royal_blue>debug<deep_sky_blue>): <white>" local err_tag = "<coral>(<red>error<coral>): <white>"
--if debug message and config debug is false, return without echoing if debug and not self.configs.dbug then return end
--if start of message is new line, print that before colored tags of message echo if what:sub(0,1)=="\n" then cecho("\n") what = what:sub(2) end cecho(main_tag) if debug then cecho(debug_tag) end if err then cecho(err_tag) end cecho(what) end

Script.name: Set Communications Configuration Values
Script.script: function communications:set_configs() local defaults = self.defaults or {} local configs = self.configs or {} -- load stored configs from file if it exists if io.exists(getMudletHomeDir().."/communications.configs.lua") then self:echo("Loading communications configurations.\n", true) table.load(getMudletHomeDir().."/communications.configs.lua",configs) self:echo("Communications configurations loaded.\n", true) end -- overwrite default values with stored config values configs = table.update(defaults, configs) self.configs = table.deepcopy(configs) table.save(getMudletHomeDir() .. "/communications.configs.lua", self.configs) end

Script.name: System disconnection
Show Comms
Script.script:
function communications:show_comms(bval) local visible = bval self.configs.comms_window.visible = visible local configs = self.configs.comms_window local x, y, w, h = configs.x, configs.y, configs.w, configs.h
self.container = self.container or Adjustable.Container:new( { name = "communications.container", adjLabelstyle = "background-color:rgba(220,220,220,100%); border: 5px groove grey;", buttonstyle = [[ QLabel{ border-radius: 7px; background-color: rgba(140,140,140,100%);} QLabel::hover{ background-color: rgba(160,160,160,50%);} ]], buttonFontSize = 10, buttonsize = 20, titleText = "Communications", titleTxtColor = "black", padding = 15, } ) self.current_tab = self.current_tab or self.tabs[1] self.container:move(x, y) self.container:resize(w, h)
self.header = self.header or Geyser.HBox:new( {name = "communications.header", x = 0, y = 0, width = "100%", height = "10%"}, self.container )
self.footer = self.footer or Geyser.Label:new( {name = "communications.footer", x = 0, y = "10%", width = "100%", height = "90%"}, self.container )
self.footer:setStyleSheet([[ background-color: black; ]])
for _, ctype in pairs(self.tabs) do self[ctype .. "_tab"] = self[ctype .. "_tab"] or Geyser.Label:new({name = "communications." .. ctype .. "_tab"}, self.header) self[ctype .. "_tab"]:setStyleSheet( [[ background-color: ]] .. self.tab_color .. [[; border-top-left-radius: 10px; border-top-right-radius: 10px; margin-right: 1px; margin-left: 1px; ]] ) self[ctype .. "_tab"]:echo("<center>" .. ctype) self[ctype .. "_tab"]:setClickCallback("communications.click", ctype)
self[ctype] = self[ctype] or Geyser.MiniConsole:new( { name = "communications." .. ctype, x = "0%", y = "0%", width = "100%", height = "100%", }, self.footer ) enableScrollBar("communications."..ctype) self[ctype]:enableAutoWrap() self[ctype]:setColor("black") self[ctype]:setFontSize(configs.fontsize) self[ctype]:bg("black") self[ctype]:fg("white") self[ctype]:hide() end
if visible then self.container:show() self[self.current_tab]:show() else self.container:hide() end
x = tonumber(string.sub(x, 1, -2)) y = tonumber(string.sub(y, 1, -2)) w = tonumber(string.sub(w, 1, -2)) h = tonumber(string.sub(h, 1, -2))
if x < 0 then x = x + 100 end if y < 0 then y = y + 100 end
--favor right docking > top > left if configs.dock then if x > 100 - (w + 10) then self.container:attachToBorder("right") elseif y < h then self.container:attachToBorder("top") elseif x < 10 then self.container:attachToBorder("left") end else self.container:attachToBorder("float") end end
function communications.click(tab) communications[communications.current_tab]:hide() communications.current_tab = tab communications[communications.current_tab]:show() end

Script.name: Append Comms
Comms Help
Comms Window Reposition
Script.script:
function communications:reposition_comms(event, containerName, width, height, x, y) if containerName ~= "communications.container" then return end local mx, my = getMainWindowSize() x = x/mx*100 y = y/my*100 width = width/mx*100 height = height/my*100
self.configs.comms_window.x = x.."%" self.configs.comms_window.y = y.."%" self.configs.comms_window.w = width.."%" self.configs.comms_window.h = height.."%" table.save(getMudletHomeDir() .. "/communications.configs.lua", self.configs)
self:show_comms(true) end
registerAnonymousEventHandler("AdjustableContainerRepositionFinish", "communications:reposition_comms")

Script.name: Script Installation Success
Script.script:
function communications:comms_installer_success(event, name) --if installed file is not the desired one if name ~= "communications_scripts" then return end self:show_help() self:set_configs() self:show_comms(self.configs.comms_window.visible) end
registerAnonymousEventHandler("sysInstallPackage", "communications:comms_installer_success")
